name: Alchemist
description: The Alchemist is a medium humanoid renowned for its potion-making skills, often seen with various alchemical supplies and vials. It has an agile build, characterized by impressive dexterity and keen intelligence.
memorable: The Alchemist's ability to craft potent potions and explosive bombs makes it a unique and strategic threat in combat.
goals: To create powerful potions, defend itself and its allies, and control the battlefield with alchemical effects.
relations: Possibly accompanied by other alchemical creatures or constructs and various allies benefiting from its potions.
environment: Typically found in labs, alchemical workshops, or regions rich in magical resources.
strengths: Excellent at crafting and using potions; capable of inflicting area damage with bombs; adept at supporting allies.
weaknesses: Average physical strength limits melee effectiveness; reliance on alchemical resources can be a potential vulnerability.
attacks: Multiattack with a dagger dealing piercing and poison damage; bombs that explode for area fire damage; strategic versatility with altering bomb types.
most_powerful_ability: Alchemical Vapors causing substantial poison damage in an area while providing resistance to certain allies.
senses: Passive perception of 15, indicating good awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in arcana, investigation, nature, and perception, showcasing expertise in magical and scientific knowledge.
additional_information: Immunity to poison damage and cannot be poisoned.
Ability to craft potions of up to legendary rarity.
Uses Pack Tactics to gain advantage on attacks when allies are nearby.
Sunlight Sensitivity imposes disadvantage on attacks and perception checks in sunlight.
Can heal itself immediately upon taking damage.
